duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide care and treatment to a variety of patients in a high acuity emergency setting.
Collaborate with physicians and other providers to ensure excellent subspecialty coverage.
Manage and oversee acute care management in a fast-paced environment.
Participate in emergency response and coordinate with medical staff for best patient outcomes.
Contribute to retirement planning and coordination for the healthcare team.

education_certification.credential: Previous experience as an advanced practice provider in the emergency setting.
Minimum of 1 year experience as an advanced practice provider.
